channel.title: CVE Feed for WPForms (Awesome Motive) -- WP Mail SMTP Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPForms (Awesome Motive) -- WP Mail SMTP Pro

item.title: CVE-2023-3213|2024-08-02T06:48:08.218Z -- wpforms%20%28awesome%20motive%29 -- wp%20mail%20smtp%20pro
item.description: The WP Mail SMTP Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the is_print_page function in versions up to, and including, 3.8.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to disclose potentially sensitive email information.
